item.description:
'Inside the Cup' is a one-person show in two acts written, conceptualized, and performed by Aaron Pitre. It is a story of human life told through nine fascinating characters and their experiences in working for the Cosmos Coffee Cup: the world's most famous coffee shop.

Each character has an intriguing story to tell. The stories are funny, touching, heart-felt, and most of all thought provoking. 'Inside the Cup' is meant to remind you that you never know who is serving you coffee at your local coffee shop, that there is always more than meets the eye to any person, and that deep down inside ourselves, we are all more alike than we are different.

Join Aaron on June 9th, 2012 at 7pm for a special performance of the show at Alchemy Juice Bar Cafe. It is going to be a great time. Tickets are $10 at the door. Students with an ID can get a ticket for $5.

For more information about 'Inside the Cup,' visit www.insidethecupshow.com
item.name: Inside the Cup at Alchemy
